results.title: Anti-ischaemic and anti-anginal activity of atenolol, nifedipine and their combination in stable, chronic effort angina.
results.text_hl: Anti-@DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_HIV_Seropositivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006679 @@@anti-anginal@@@ activity of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ and their combination in stable, @DISEASE_Neurocirculatory_Asthenia @DISEASE_MESH:D009449 @@@chronic effort angina@@@.

citations.NLM: Lai C, Onnis E, Pirisi R, Orani E, Delogu G, Cherchi A. Anti-ischaemic and anti-anginal activity of atenolol, nifedipine and their combination in stable, chronic effort angina. Drugs Exp Clin Res. 1988;14(11):699-705. PMID: 3073077

results.title: Efficacy of ivabradine, a new selective I(f) inhibitor, compared with atenolol in patients with chronic stable angina.
results.text_hl: The objective of this study was to compare the @<m>DISEASE_HIV_Seropositivity</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006679 @@@anti-anginal@@@ and anti-@DISEASE_Optic_Neuropathy_Ischemic @DISEASE_MESH:D018917 @@@ischaemic@@@ effects of @CHEMICAL_Ivabradine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077550 @@@ivabradine@@@ and the beta-blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Tardif JC, Ford I, Tendera M, Bourassa MG, Fox K, INITIATIVE Investigators. Efficacy of ivabradine, a new selective I(f) inhibitor, compared with atenolol in patients with chronic stable angina. Eur Heart J. 2005 Dec;26(23):2529-36. PMID: 16214830
